enableTooltips.name: Enable Tooltips
enableTooltips.hint: Show tooltips with top and bottom when hovering levels objects

tokenElevScale.name: Elevation Scale
tokenElevScale.hint: Change size of tokens based on the elevation of the controlled token

tokenElevScaleMultiSett.name: Elevation Scale Multiplier
tokenElevScaleMultiSett.hint: Multiply elevation scale by this number. A number larger than 1 will make tokens bigger while one smaller than 1 will make them smaller

fogHiding.name: Advanced Fog of War
fogHiding.hint: Hide unexplored floors from the explored fog of war

lockElevation.name: Lock Elevation
lockElevation.hint: Prevent players from changing elevation from the token HUD. Keep in mind that if the player has permission to edit tokens they will be able to change it in the token config

defaultLosHeight.name: Default Token Height
defaultLosHeight.hint: Height of a token (where the eyes of that creature are) in units. Default 6.

autoLOSHeight.name: Automatic token height
autoLOSHeight.hint: Automatically calculate token height based on size and scale. Will ignore default token height but per token settings not set to 0 will have priority over the automatic calculation

debugRaycast.name: DEBUG: Enable ray visualization
debugRaycast.hint: Show the 3D Sight rays (green visible, red not visible)

preciseLightOcclusion.name: Experimental: Precise light occlusion
preciseLightOcclusion.hint: Removes light occlusion artefacts at the cost of performance

preciseTokenVisibility.name: Precise token visibility
preciseTokenVisibility.hint: Enabling this option will check for sight against corners of the token in addition to the center at the cost of some performance

exactTokenVisibility.name: Exact token visibility
exactTokenVisibility.hint: Precise token visibility must be enabled for this option to work. This option will do an 11 point check against the token's corners. Suggested if you are using 3D Canvas

blockSightMovement.name: Fence
blockSightMovement.hint: When enabled, walls with height that does not restrict vision will still restrict movement

forceUiRefresh.name: Force UI refresh
forceUiRefresh.hint: Forces more frequent refreshes of the levels UI at the cost of performance, if enabled may cause issues on specific systems (eg. PF2e)

revealTokenInFog.name: Reveal token in fog
revealTokenInFog.hint: If a token is visible, reveal the fog of war around that token

tileconfig.noOverhead: This is NOT an overhead tile, this tile will be rendered at the background elevation. To change these settings, please enable the 'Is Overhead?' option in the overhead tab.
tileconfig.occlusionNone: Occlusion Mode is set to 'None', this tile will not block sight. Set Occlusion Mode to 'Fade' if you want this tile to block sight.

showIfAbove.name: Show even when below?
showIfAbove.hint: If enabled, the tile will be shown even if the token is below the bottom height range (example use, balconies)

showAboveRange.name: Max Elevation Difference
showAboveRange.hint: When 'Show even when below?' is enabled, this is the maximum elevation difference between the token and the tile, past this value the tile will no longer show.

isBasement.name: Strict Range
isBasement.hint: If enabled, the tile will only be shown if the token is inside the tile range, this means that a token above the top range will not see this tile.

noFogHide.name: Don't hide this tile in the Fog
noFogHide.hint: Exclude this tile from Level's 'Advanced Fog of War'.

noCollision.name: Allow Sight
noCollision.hint: If enabled, the tile will not block sight.

allWallBlockSight.name: All Walls Block Sight
allWallBlockSight.hint: When checked, all walls under this tile will count as vision blocking when the tile is not occluded.

elevatorFloors.name: Elevator Floors
elevatorFloors.hint: Define Floors as: elevation,name|elevation,name... - eg. 0,Ground Floor|10,First Floor...

backgroundElevation.name: Background Elevation
backgroundElevation.notes: An elevation in distance units which configures the height of the background image and underfoot tiles.

weatherElevation.name: Weather Elevation
weatherElevation.notes: An elevation in distance units which configures the height of the weather effects.

lightMasking.name: Levels: Don't disable lights
lightMasking.notes: When enabled, Levels will not take control of Light visibility, this option should be disabled in scenes that make use of multiple levels.

levelshole.name: Place drawings as Stairs when enabled, place as holes when disabled

placeOverhead.name: Place tiles as overhead tiles 'inside' levels

setTemplateElevation.name: Set elevation for next placed template

removeLevel.title: Remove Level
removeLevel.content: Are you sure you want to remove this level?

getFromScene.title: Get Levels from Scene
getFromScene.content: Get Levels from current scene? This will overwrite your current levels

elevation.title: Set Elevation for next Template placement

sceneDrop.title: Levels - Scene Drop
sceneDrop.content: All elements from the dropped scene will be placed at the current level, are you sure you want to continue?

checkScene.title: Levels - Scene Checker
checkScene.content: Detected tiles with polygons that were possibly not autodetected or defined correctly, please doublecheck the following tiles:
checkScene.learnMore: Don't Know what the Polygon is? Having other issues? Check out the Levels page, it includes a video dedicated to the Polygon!

ui.title: Levels - Layer Tool
ui.tokenAttacher: Place Token Attacher prefabs relative to the current level<hr>If you are NOT placing Prefabs, this option needs to be DISABLED
ui.warning: WARNING! 'Don't disable lights' is enabled in the Scene Settings - Multiple levels will not work correctly. Click to resolve this issue.

err.collision: Levels: The attempted movement collides with at least one floor/ceiling
err.tokenOOB: Levels: The token %n height exceeds the ceiling of the currently selected level. Please manually set the token height or make your level higher. Find out more here.
err.wallheight: WARNING! Levels requires Wall Height to be version 4.1.0 or higher to work correctly.
err.lessfog: Levels: WARNING! Less Fog detected - token visibility will not work as expected, please disable either module
err.tokenheight: Levels: WARNING! Detected 'Enable Token Height' option enabled in module Wall Height - this setting is incompatible with Levels and has been disabled!
err.elevatedvision: Levels: WARNING! Detected 'Default for automatic token elevation' option enabled in module 'Elevated Vision' - this setting is known to disrupt Levels regular functionality and has been disabled!
err.elevatedvisioncompat: Levels: WARNING! Detected module 'Elevated Vision' - this module is known to disrupt Levels regular functionality and should not be used in combination with Levels.

info.advancedMode: Levels: Advanced Mode option in Better Roofs has been enabled.

midiqol.tokenvis: Enabling the 'Players control owned hidden tokens' option in MidiQOL will cause token visibility issues. Please disable this option in the module settings.
